text:
Traitify | Full Stack/Backend Engineers | Full Time | Remote | Apply at https://traitify.breezy.hr

Founded in 2011, Traitify is a Baltimore-based technology company working to make personality a core element of social engagement and electronic commerce. Offering an array of visual personality assessments and the world's first personality API, Traitify helps individuals and organizations to create more human experiences and unlock the power of psychology and big data.

Tech: Front End: Rails/React/Elixir/Postgres Back End: Java/Elixir/Postgres/ElasticSearch/Microservices

Hiring Process: Phone Screen by Me > Interview with Team You'll Work With > Interview with Founders > Offer
